com.scalar.db.sql.metadata

Interface NamespaceMetadata

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNamespaceMetadata, CachedNamespaceMetadata

    public interface NamespaceMetadata
    Metadata for a namespace.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the namespace.
      java.util.Optional<TableMetadata> getTable(java.lang.String tableName)
      Returns the TableMetadata objects for the specified namespace.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TableMetadata> getTables()
      Returns a map of the namespace names and TableMetadata objects.
